bibl.title: Α Puzzle.
bibl.note: The text is puzzling. It could be an amulet. Line 2 refers to a writing that conveys mercy. The following lines should probably read as numbers (isopsephic cryptogram?).

bibl.title: Fabian Reiter (herausgegeben von), Literarische Texte der Berliner Papyrussammlung. Zur Wiedereröffnung des Neuen Museums = Berliner Klassiker Texte. 10

bibl.seg: de Bruyn Theodore S., Α Puzzle.

Fabian Reiter (herausgegeben von), Literarische Texte der Berliner Papyrussammlung. Zur Wiedereröffnung des Neuen Museums = Berliner Klassiker Texte. 10 (Berlin - Boston, 2012) pp. 239-242 et pl. coul. XXXV.
The text is puzzling. It could be an amulet. Line 2 refers to a writing that conveys mercy. The following lines should probably read as numbers (isopsephic cryptogram?).
